verses.text_plain: Remember, O Lord, what is come upon us: consider, and behold our reproach.
verses.verse_html: 1Remember, O Lord, what is come upon us: consider, and behold our reproach.

tokens.text: what is come upon us: consider

verses.text_plain: Our inheritance is turned to strangers, our houses to aliens.
verses.verse_html: 2Our inheritance is turned to strangers, our houses to aliens.

verses.text_plain: We are orphans and fatherless, our mothers are as widows.
verses.verse_html: 3We are orphans and fatherless, our mothers are as widows.

verses.text_plain: We have drunken our water for money; our wood is sold unto us.
verses.verse_html:
4We have drunken our water for money; our wood is sold unto us. ▼
▼ is…: Heb. cometh for price

footnotes.body_html: ▼ is…: Heb. cometh for price

verses.text_plain: Our necks are under persecution: we labour, and have no rest.
verses.verse_html:
5Our necks are under persecution: we labour, and have no rest. ▼
▼ Our…: Heb. On our necks are we persecuted

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Our…: Heb. On our necks are we persecuted
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Our…: Heb. On our necks are we persecuted

verses.text_plain: We have given the hand to the Egyptians, and to the Assyrians, to be satisfied with bread.
verses.verse_html: 6We have given the hand to the Egyptians, and to the Assyrians, to be satisfied with bread.

verses.text_plain: Our fathers have sinned, and are not; and we have borne their iniquities.
verses.verse_html: 7Our fathers have sinned, and are not; and we have borne their iniquities.

verses.text_plain: Servants have ruled over us: there is none that doth deliver us out of their hand.
verses.verse_html: 8Servants have ruled over us: there is none that doth deliver us out of their hand.

verses.text_plain: We gat our bread with the peril of our lives because of the sword of the wilderness.
verses.verse_html: 9We gat our bread with the peril of our lives because of the sword of the wilderness.

verses.text_plain: Our skin was black like an oven because of the terrible famine.
verses.verse_html:
10Our skin was black like an oven because of the terrible famine. ▼
▼ terrible: or, terrors, or, storms

footnotes.body_html: ▼ terrible: or, terrors, or, storms

verses.text_plain: They ravished the women in Zion, and the maids in the cities of Judah.
verses.verse_html: 11They ravished the women in Zion, and the maids in the cities of Judah.

verses.text_plain: Princes are hanged up by their hand: the faces of elders were not honoured.
verses.verse_html: 12Princes are hanged up by their hand: the faces of elders were not honoured.

verses.text_plain: They took the young men to grind, and the children fell under the wood.
verses.verse_html: 13They took the young men to grind, and the children fell under the wood.

verses.text_plain: The elders have ceased from the gate, the young men from their musick.
verses.verse_html: 14The elders have ceased from the gate, the young men from their musick.

verses.text_plain: The joy of our heart is ceased; our dance is turned into mourning.
verses.verse_html: 15The joy of our heart is ceased; our dance is turned into mourning.

verses.text_plain: The crown is fallen from our head: woe unto us, that we have sinned!
verses.verse_html:
16The crown is fallen from our head: woe unto us, that we have sinned! ▼
▼ The…: Heb. The crown of our head is fallen

tokens.text: unto us, that we have sinned

footnotes.body_text: ▼ The…: Heb. The crown of our head is fallen
footnotes.body_html: ▼ The…: Heb. The crown of our head is fallen

verses.text_plain: For this our heart is faint; for these things our eyes are dim.
verses.verse_html: 17For this our heart is faint; for these things our eyes are dim.

verses.text_plain: Because of the mountain of Zion, which is desolate, the foxes walk upon it.
verses.verse_html: 18Because of the mountain of Zion, which is desolate, the foxes walk upon it.

verses.text_plain: Thou, O Lord, remainest for ever; thy throne from generation to generation.
verses.verse_html: 19Thou, O Lord, remainest for ever; thy throne from generation to generation.

verses.text_plain: Wherefore dost thou forget us for ever, and forsake us so long time?
verses.verse_html:
20Wherefore dost thou forget us for ever, and forsake us so long time? ▼
▼ so…: Heb. for length of days?

footnotes.body_text: ▼ so…: Heb. for length of days?
footnotes.body_html: ▼ so…: Heb. for length of days?

verses.text_plain: Turn thou us unto thee, O Lord, and we shall be turned; renew our days as of old.
verses.verse_html: 21Turn thou us unto thee, O Lord, and we shall be turned; renew our days as of old.

tokens.text: thou us unto thee, O Lord

verses.text_plain: But thou hast utterly rejected us; thou art very wroth against us.
verses.verse_html:
22But thou hast utterly rejected us; thou art very wroth against us. ▼
▼ But…: or, For wilt thou utterly reject us?

footnotes.body_text: ▼ But…: or, For wilt thou utterly reject us?
footnotes.body_html: ▼ But…: or, For wilt thou utterly reject us?
